Designate an area where Frostshapers will automatically cast Ice Crystal.
Removes Ice Crystal spots. Frostshapers will no longer automatically cast Ice Crystal in this area.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.SolarPinholeArea.Expan: Designate an area where Skipmasters will automatically cast Solar Pinhole.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.SolarPinholeArea.Remov: Removes Solar Pinhole spots. Skipmasters will no longer automatically cast Solar Pinhole in this area.
